creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Pigeons are so strong and useful. They carry messages, packages, incurable diseases…

Make pigeons even more extraordinarily resourceful by merging different mutant bird species and creating new and improved flying servants!

Breed your very own flock of homing pigeons or mix and match a personal army of superbug vectors:

The possibilities are flying all over.


PIGEON FEATURES

🕊️Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🕊️Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the pigeons

HOW TO PLAY

🕊️Drag and drop similar pigeons to create new mutant creatures
🕊️Use pigeon eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🕊️Alternatively, fiercely tap a pigeon to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🕊️Different stages and many pigeon species to discover
🕊️A mind-blowing story with flying twists!
🕊️The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🕊️Doodle-like illustrations
🕊️Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🕊️No pigeons were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Just don’t feed your pigeons at public squares, please.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: 🕊️Merge pigeons, create new species and take evolution to the skies!🕊️

Pigeons are so strong and useful. They carry messages, packages, incurable diseases…

Make pigeons even more extraordinarily resourceful by merging different mutant bird species and creating new and improved flying servants!

Breed your very own flock of homing pigeons or mix and match a personal army of superbug vectors:

The possibilities are flying all over.


PIGEON FEATURES

🕊️Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🕊️Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the pigeons

HOW TO PLAY

🕊️Drag and drop similar pigeons to create new mutant creatures
🕊️Use pigeon eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🕊️Alternatively, fiercely tap a pigeon to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🕊️Different stages and many pigeon species to discover
🕊️A mind-blowing story with flying twists!
🕊️The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🕊️Doodle-like illustrations
🕊️Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🕊️No pigeons were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Just don’t feed your pigeons at public squares, please.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: Merge pigeons, create new species and take evolution to the skies!

🕊️Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🕊️Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the pigeons

HOW TO PLAY

🕊️Drag and drop similar pigeons to create new mutant creatures
🕊️Use pigeon eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🕊️Alternatively, fiercely tap a pigeon to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🕊️Different stages and many pigeon species to discover
🕊️A mind-blowing story with flying twists!
🕊️The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🕊️Doodle-like illustrations
🕊️Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🕊️No pigeons were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Just don’t feed your pigeons at public squares, please.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: Merge pigeons, create new species and take evolution to the skies!
